title: Police officer describes moment he was shot with crossbow - as attacker jailed
description: Jason King, 54, shot PC Curtis Foster with a crossbow after stabbing a neighbour following an altercation in Downley, Wycombe, in May last year.
content:
A police officer has described the moment he was shot with a crossbow - as his "extremely dangerous" attacker was sentenced to nine years in jail.

title: Alexander Isak and Newcastle approach point of no return after striker’s latest outburst
description: Club may say they want to keep Isak but a move is now in the interests of both while Eddie Howe is best off pursuing other targets
content: As a general rule, it is almost always best to sleep on things before making important decisions or reacting to provocations. So why, at close to midnight on Tuesday, did Newcastle rush out a seemingly kneejerk response to Alexander Isak’s incendiary... [5324 chars]

title: Women with Alzheimer’s have unusually low omega fatty acid levels, study finds
description: Analysis of blood samples finds women with the disease have 20% lower levels, a pattern not seen in men
content:
Women should ensure they are getting enough omega fatty acids in their diets according to researchers, who found unusually low levels of the compounds in female patients with Alzheimer’s disease.
The advice follows an analysis of blood samples from A... [3132 chars]

title: Kai Havertz injury: Arsenal forward being assessed over knee problem

content:
